thread.title: Problems with the models in the viewport

post.author: HelderPinto
post.body:
Hey guys...
I'm having a problem.

Everytime I try to load a model into my map, I select the model I wanna import, and it all works fine ingame.
But In the editor, is stays a cube, and I know it was suposed to show you some sort of preview, of what the model looks like.
Is there any workaround for this?

Thanks in advance

EDIT :: nevermind, I'm still having some problems, but I figured out the mail one.
I was puting in the models in the rendered mode (f3), and I needed to render the scene (f7), for it to show up.
